conbody.p: Packages are primarily used by Design Studio (DS) Workbench to group together related model files of a project. This ensures that the model files you created will not conflict (or have the same name) with other model files stored centrally. Each package can be further divided into one or more subpackages to filter related items of the parent package.

For example, you might create a pageflow package for the Triple'A Plus Portfolio Management and Analysis (PM&A) component, and then create separate subpackages to store related files of the financial functions of the Triple'A Plus Web Portfolio Management & Analysis module such Rebalancing and Valuation.
